metadata.description: Test cases for evaluating video ideation quality

test_cases.input: Create 3 ASMR video ideas about rain sounds
test_cases.reference: Ideas should focus on relaxation, include sensory details, and be visually calming

test_cases.input: Generate ideas for a cooking channel featuring Italian cuisine
test_cases.reference: Should include authentic Italian dishes, visual appeal, and step-by-step guidance

test_cases.input: Create video ideas for AI technology explainers aimed at beginners
test_cases.reference: Should be accessible, use analogies, and include real-world examples

test_cases.input: Generate 5 short-form video ideas about productivity tips for remote workers
test_cases.reference: Practical, actionable tips that can be demonstrated visually

test_cases.input: Create ASMR video ideas featuring office sounds and typing
test_cases.reference: Should evoke calm focus, include variety of office ambient sounds

test_cases.input: Generate video ideas for a fitness channel targeting beginners
test_cases.reference: Low-impact exercises, encouraging tone, clear demonstrations

test_cases.input: Create video ideas about space exploration for young audiences
test_cases.reference: Engaging, educational, age-appropriate language, visual spectacle

test_cases.input: Generate ideas for a travel vlog series in Japan
test_cases.reference: Cultural insights, beautiful locations, local food, respectful representation

test_cases.input: Create video ideas for DIY home improvement projects
test_cases.reference: Practical projects, clear instructions, budget-friendly options

test_cases.input: Generate ASMR video ideas with a cozy cafe theme
test_cases.reference: Coffee sounds, ambient chatter, rain on windows, warm aesthetic

test_cases.input: Create educational video ideas about personal finance for millennials
test_cases.reference: Relatable scenarios, actionable advice, avoiding jargon

test_cases.input: Generate ideas for a pet care channel focusing on cats
test_cases.reference: Health tips, behavior insights, entertaining cat content

test_cases.input: Create video ideas for a gaming channel covering indie games
test_cases.reference: Discovery of hidden gems, honest reviews, gameplay highlights

test_cases.input: Generate ideas for meditation and mindfulness videos
test_cases.reference: Calming voice, beautiful visuals, various meditation styles

test_cases.input: Create video ideas about sustainable living and eco-friendly tips
test_cases.reference: Practical swaps, positive framing, avoid guilt-tripping
